entry.title: $2450 // LARGE 1 BEDROOM WITH PRIVATE ROOF DECK, LAUNDRY, GREAT VIEW, NICE APT.
entry.content:
Recently renovated 1Br apartment in a quiet upper east side townhouse.
The apartment features a spacious bedroom that gets great natural light, hardwood floors, overhead track lighting, separate kitchen w/ dishwasher and mounted microwave, marble bathroom, and a spiral staircase that allows access to your private roof deck!
---
Located near the 68th Street 6-train station. Around the corner from the M15 bus. Walking distance to Hunter College, Rockefeller University, and the New York Presbyterian Hospital.
---
Pet-friendly. Laundry in building! 5th floor of a walk-up building.
--- 0132
BUILDING AMENITIES
-Laundry in Building
-Live-in Super
-Dishwasher
-Guarantors Accepted
-Outdoor Space
-Roof Deck
EMAIL ME FOR VIEWING!
